Method Summary
 Heading1 create()
          This method is just to keep the API consistent when you do something like: Heading1 myHEading = Heading1.with("h3333").create(); It is just to have that "create()" at the end but the following code is the same: Heading1 myHEading = Heading1.with("h3333"); Anyway, it is here for sake of consistency

create

public Heading1 create()
Description copied from interface: IFluentElement
This method is just to keep the API consistent when you do something like: Heading1 myHEading = Heading1.with("h3333").create(); It is just to have that "create()" at the end but the following code is the same: Heading1 myHEading = Heading1.with("h3333"); Anyway, it is here for sake of consistency

Specified by:
create in interface IFluentElement<Heading1>
Returns:
